node.excerpt: Yesterday morning I saw a call for help by Maud Vanhauwaert, Antwerp’s city poet. For a new city poem / installation she was looking for a solution to time inflation and deflation of big letters, spelling the word “Macht” (which translates to “Power” in English). On the shelf timers didn’t work for…

frontmatter.title: Quick Hack, Timing an Air Pump with Arduino
